type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Sprinting

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/freeze).

Freezes the entity as if they were in powder snow.

Type ID: `apugli:freeze`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Sprinting

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/freeze).

Freezes the entity as if they were in powder snow.

Type ID: `apugli:freeze`



---

modifier.description: If set, this modifier will apply to the time it takes to fully freeze an entity.
modifier.markdownDescription: If set, this modifier will apply to the time it takes to fully freeze an entity.

modifiers.description: If set, these modifiers will apply to the time it takes to fully freeze an entity.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, these modifiers will apply to the time it takes to fully freeze an entity.

should_damage.description: Whether this power type's freeze should damage the power holder.
should_damage.markdownDescription: Whether this power type's freeze should damage the power holder.
